questions.question: What is the predominant color of the main device body?
What shape best describes the main device's overall form?
What material appears to constitute the majority of the device's casing?
What type of display is integrated into the device's surface?
How many visibly distinct attachments are included with the device?
What is the apparent color of the interchangeable attachments?
What is the general shape of each of the included attachments?
What seems to be the primary function suggested by the device's design?
What texture does the main device's surface appear to possess?
What type of control buttons are present on the main device?
What seems to be the material of the smaller metallic part on the device?
Considering the attachments, what is the likely use case of this device?
What kind of finish does the main body of the device seem to have?
Is there any visible branding or logo on the device?
What is the general design style of the device (modern, retro, etc.)?
